item.title: Tips and Tricks With Bash and Zsh
item.description: In this blog post I go over some tips and tricks with bash and cover some of the newer features in bash such as associative arrays which are available in Bash 4. Using Bash History features A lot of people know about hitting the up and down keys in their keyboard to access history but you can also utilize the !! operator to access history in bash. Say that we run the following command:
